com.camerontec.util.exceptions

Class ExceptionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.exceptions.ExceptionUtils

  • public class ExceptionUtils
extends Object
    This class contains utility methods used to manipulate exceptions.
    Author:
    Guillaume Jacob (guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com)
